author: Staff Reporter
text:
Ranganathan Educational Institutions will conduct a diploma job fair on February 21 on the college premises in Thondamuthur. The fair is open for final year students of all engineering disciplines, but only for those who have registered for the fair. Those interested may register either through post or e-mail (rpcjobfair2016 @gmail.com). The last date for registration is February 15. For details, call 98947-94765. The Institutions will also conduct a project expo on February 27.

Conference

PSGR Krishnammal College for Women recently hosted a national conference on information and communication technologies for environment safety. The objective of the conference was to create awareness on ‘green information technology’. The Departments of Computer Science, and Information Technology conducted it.
title: Job fair to be held
